If Chrome suddenly tells you [https://ww.mailpile.is/](https://ww.mailpile.is/) is insecure with SHA-1, it's a caching bug on your computer: [sslmate.com/blog...](https://sslmate.com/blog/post/chrome_cached_sha1_chains)
